title: Macbook A1989, 820-00850, won't boot
message:
consumption 5 V 0.35A
Here are my measurements on this board:
[LIST]
[*][B]UB300[/B]
[*]0V6 diode mode on [n:USBC_TA_CC1] at [p:CB313:1] =[B]0.558[/B]
0V6 diode mode on [n:USBC_TA_CC2] at [p:CB314:1] =[B]0.564[/B]

5V on [p:FB200:1]=[B]5v[/B]
3V3 on [p:CB308:1] =[B]3.34v[/B]
1V8 on [p:CB305:1]=[B]1.795v[/B]
1V8 on [p:CB306:1]=[B]1.8v[/B]
1V1 on [p:CB304:1]=[B]1.12v[/B]


[*]~26V on [p:QB400:1]=[B]10.82v [/B]and [p:QB400:4]=[B]7.15v[/B]
Check [PDCIN_G3H] on [p:QB400:8]=[B]5v[/B]
[*][B]UB400[/B]
0V6 diode mode on [n:USBC_TB_CC1] at [p:CB413:1]=[B]0.7[/B]
0V6 diode mode on [n:USBC_TB_CC2] at [p:CB414:1]=[B]0.7[/B]

5V on [p:FB201:1]]=[B]5v[/B]
3V3 on [p:CB408:1]=[B]3.34v[/B]
1V8 on [p:CB405:1]=[B]1.8v[/B]
1V8 on [p:CB406:1]=[B]1.8v[/B]
1V1 on [p:CB404:1]=[B]1.12v[/B]

~26V on [p:QB400:1]=[B]10.82v [/B]and [p:QB400:4]=[B]7.15v[/B]
Check [PDCIN_G3H] on [p:QB400:8]=[B]5v[/B]
[*][B]U3100[/B]
0V6 diode mode on [n:USBC_XA_CC1] at [p:C3113:1]=[B]0.558[/B]
0V6 diode mode on [n:USBC_XA_CC2] at [p:C3114:1]=[B]0.564[/B]

5V on [p:F3000:1]=[B]5v[/B]
3V3 on [p:C3108:1]==[B]3.34v[/B]
1V8 on [p:C3105:1]=[B]1.796v[/B]
1V8 on [p:C3106:1]=[B]1.8v[/B]
1V1 on [p:C3104:1]=[B]1.12v[/B]

Check 26V on [p:Q3100:1] =[B]10.85v [/B]and [p:Q3100:4]=[B]7.24v[/B]
Check [PDCIN_G3H] on [p:Q3100:8]=[B]5v[/B]
[*][B]U3200[/B]
0V6 diode mode on [n:USBC_XB_CC1] at [p:C3213:1]=[B]0.550[/B]
0V6 diode mode on [n:USBC_XB_CC2] at [p:C3214:1]=[B]0.561[/B]

5V on [p:F3001:1]=[B]5v[/B]
3V3 on [p:C3208:1]=[B]3.34v[/B]
1V8 on [p:C3205:1]=[B]1.8v[/B]
1V8 on [p:C3206:1]=[B]1.796v[/B]
1V1 on [p:C3204:1]=[B]1.12v[/B]

Check 26V on [p:Q3200:1]=[B]10.81v [/B]and [p:Q3200:4]=[B]7.48v[/B]
Check [PDCIN_G3H] on [p:Q3200:8]=[B]5v[/B]
[*]5V to 20V sequence
USBC CC1/2 & T2-SMC I2C
Diode mode ~0V6 on [n:USB_XA_CC1] at [p:C3113:1]]=[B]0.558[/B]
Diode mode ~0V6 on [n:USB_XA_CC2] at [p:C3114:1]=[B]0.564[/B]
Diode mode ~0V6 on [n:I2C_UPC_SDA] at [p:R5220:2]=[B]0.421[/B]
Diode mode ~0V6 on [n:I2C_UPC_SCL] at [p:R5221:2]=[B]0.421[/B]

Power getting to the CD3215...
5V on [P20V_USBC_XA_VBUS] at [p:F3000:1]=[B]5v[/B]

Basic CD3215 voltages + LDOs...
3V3 on [P3V3_UPC_XA_LDO] at [p:C3108:1]=[B]3.34v[/B]
1V8 on [P1V8_UPC_XA_LDOA] at [p:C3106:1]=[B]1.8v[/B]
1V8 on [P1V8_UPC_XA_LDOD] at [p:C3105:1]=[B]1.795v[/B]
1V1 on [P1V1_UPC_XA_LDO_BMC] at [p:C3104:1]=[B]1.12v[/B]

Open [p:Q3100] so power goes through to [PDCIN_G3H]...
>5V on [n:UPC_XA_GATE1] at [p:Q3100:1]=[B]10.84v[/B]
>5V on [n:UPC_XA_GATE2] at [p:Q3100:4]=[B]7.24v[/B]
5V on [PDCIN_G3H] at [p:C7000:1]=[B]5v[/B]

Power to the ISL [p:U7000] ...
(in) 5V on [n:TBA_VDDA] at [p:C7075:1]=[B]5.15v[/B]
(out) >=3V3 on [n:CHGR_EN_MVR] at [p:R6907:2]=[B]5.15v[/B]

Getting [P3V3_G3H_RTC] ...
3V3 on [P3V3_G3H_RTC] at [p:L6900:1]=[B]3.38v[/B]

20V switch over...
20V on [P20V_USBC_XA_VBUS] at [p:F3000:1]=[B]5.08v[/B]
>20V on [n:UPC_XA_GATE1] at [p:Q3100:1]]=[B]10.84v[/B]
>20V on [n:UPC_XA_GATE2] at [p:Q3100:4]=[B]7.24v[/B]
20V on [PDCIN_G3H] at [p:C7000:1]=[B]5v[/B]

Final steps...
5V on [n:TBA_AUX_DET] at [p:C7016:1]=[B]5v[/B]
MOSFETS [p:Q7030] and [p:Q7040] should now be open
[p:U7000] should be generating [PBUS_G3H]=[B]12.31v[/B]
[/LIST]

[MEDIA=youtube]3u7KrQavfTU[/MEDIA]

title: Macbook A1989, 820-00850, won't boot
message:
Please, use ONLY schematic points to specify readings.
You made very difficult to read this post.
A lot of readings, which don't help too much.

My first question, all USB-C ports have the same behavior?
AUX_DET should have 1.25V aprox; did you inject 5V there?
Not sure what mean the readings bellow "20V switch over..."; did you inject 20V on the board?

BTW, do not use "V" when you post diode mode readings.
